list.title: canExecuteFastAttack
list.description: The fast attack is available when the knight is sleeping.

list.title: canFreePrisoner
list.description: The final stage in the plan: freeing Annalyn's best friend.

list.title: canSignalPrisoner
list.description: You'll get caught by the archer if you signal while they're awake.

list.title: canSpy
list.description: A useful spy captures information, which they can't do if everyone's asleep.
